title: Bug 37498BIDI: rtloriented TableCursor set next column instead of previos and vice versa, when it uses right and left arrow keys.
OB: Bug 37498BIDI: rtloriented TableCursor set next column instead of previos and vice versa, when it uses right and left arrow keys.
EB: When TableCursor has rtl orientation, left and right arrow keys should beswapped.
